text: Animal Jam Classic, formerly known as Animal Jam is a virtual world made by WildWorks and the National Geographic Society. Many of the players in Animal Jam are children and teenagers. According to the WildWorks website, the game has about 160 million players. Animal Jam is one of the fastest growing children's games in the world. The game is free to play, but to be able to receive all the things Animal Jam has to offer, a membership needs to be purchased online or through a store-purchased gift card. In Animal Jam Classic, players enjoy many fun events, like playing games, making friends, and decorating their dens and animals. They also learn facts about science, especially in the field of zoology, the study of animals. Animal Jam takes place in a world called Jamaa, and each player is known in the game as a Jammer. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2010 video games Category:Browser games Category:Educational video games Category:Flash games Category:MacOS games Category:Massively multiplayer online games Category:National Geographic Society Category:Video games about animals Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
title: Animal Jam Classic
